subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Jon Izaguirre of Spain won the 16th stage of the Giro d’Italia, while his countryman Joaquin Rodriguez kept the overall lead by 30 seconds.
snippet: Jon Izaguirre of Spain won the 16th stage of the Giro d’Italia, while his countryman Joaquin Rodriguez kept the overall lead by 30 seconds.
